description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. In a world where love is taken for granted, one Cupid has had enough! Play as the Anti-Cupid, using your abilities and special powers to crush budding romances, fighting the special forces of the Cupid agenda and generally ruin the day of anyone else in your path.
description.short: In a world where love is taken for granted, one Cupid has had enough! Play as the Anti-Cupid, using your abilities and special powers to crush budding romances, fighting the special forces of the Cupid agenda and generally ruin the day of anyone else in your path.
